PersonalStatement.text: Alexandria Harris, born on 1979-07-20, is a Female based in Port Robert, Saint Martin. She is Single and holds Bangladeshi nationality. Currently working at Peterson-Michael.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Rhodes, Edwards and Berry from 2007 to 2017.
Senior HR Manager at Peterson-Michael, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Beijing University of Technology
Master's in Engineering from Universidad Externado de Colombia

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys hiking.
